title: Disposal Method Criteria
content:
Disposal Method Criteria

State Regulations
§ 382.30 - Scope, purpose and applicability
§ 382.31 - Criteria for all disposal methods
§ 382.32 - Additional criteria for aboveground and belowground disposal
§ 382.33 - Additional criteria for aboveground disposal only
§ 382.34 - Additional criteria for belowground disposal only
§ 382.35 - Additional criteria for underground mined repository disposal

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
